About the Company: Rainbow Foundations Ltd (RFL),is a gigantic construction company with an enviable track record in the real estate scenario of Chennai. The prime properties of the company include Rainbow Arcade, Rainbow Praveen, Rainbow Nirav, Rainbow Plaza, Rainbow Court, and dozen such commercially attractive properties, which are located in and around Chennai Metropolis.RFLs upcoming portfolio comprise Rainbow Park (Raja Anamalai Puram), Independent Houses (Guduvanchery) and Rainbow Towers (General Peters Road).
